author: Agung Pamungkas
comment: Looks wonderful but it can't auto update the data, I used Moto 360 first Gen, and Android 6, so it won't auto update until you tab on google wear and re-tap this facer and the data will update. If I'm not doing that the data will remain still days after days. All permission has been set successfully.

author: Ric Smit
comment: Looks great and does everything its supposed to do, but my moto battery struggles to get through 8hrs. Hence only 3 stars!
title: Looks great But!

author: Trey G
comment: So ambient mode is more of a strobe light feature as my screen flashes tons of times before registering any input, and after changing the display option to always on in the watch settings app, it never goes into ambient and just drains my battery. No option for current weather is a deal breaker. Knowing what the weather is going to be later is useful. But not as useful without current weather. Hope to see an update fixing these issues. Will downgrade to 1 star if no fix comes as the face seems bugged.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your helpful feedback,
the current weather is shown on the left of the weather forecast.
Would you please give us more information about your situation,Please feel free to contact us .Thank you.

title: Ambient mode? Current temperature?

author: Phantom Masquerade
comment: Wish I could change the color of the minute hand, non ambient.
title: Great customization. Plenty of Intel.

author: Sultan Al-Saqri
comment: It always start with ambient mod for one second then it change to active mod and that is really annoying. and it's not free!

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Would you please try this?
Turn "Always-on Screen" off on the watch's setting and
Set 'Time to Ambient mode' to 'Always ON' on the V12's setting screen.
Please feel free to contact our email address.I can give you a help.
Thank you.

author: Steve Zurlo
comment: Flashes in and out of ambient mode before displaying normal active watch face, even with Ambient screen disabled in Android Wear on the watch.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Would you please try this?
Turn "Always-on Screen" off on the watch's setting and
Set 'Time to Ambient mode' to 'Always ON' on the V12's setting screen.
Thank you.
